translation.en: Emily!
You're the medical examiner?
Mr. Rose?
I'm sorry, Mr. Rose...
...but I cannot state conclusively...
...that the cause of death was natural.
translation.es: ...que la causa de la muertehaya sido natural.

translation.en: Your daughter, she....
Excuse me, Father?
Father Moore.
You'll have to come with me.
-Father Moore! -Will you plead guilty?
-Tell us about the exorcism! -Over here, Father Moore!
We're at Crescent County Courthouse. We show you Father Richard Moore....
translation.es: Desde el tribunal de Crescent County,mostramos al Padre Richard Moore...

translation.en: -What about the parents? -They're not talking to the police.
translation.es: -¿Y los padres?-No hablan con la policía.

translation.en: Do we charge them?
No. Even the priest admits he ran the show.
translation.es: No. El sacerdote admiteque montó el show.

translation.en: We need a Christian on this.
Preferably a Catholic.
Somebody that knows this shit inside out...
translation.es: Alguien que conozca esta basuradesde adentro...

translation.en: ...and who the public will see as unbiased.
We're going after a holy man here.
He's not Catholic, though. Methodist, I think.
translation.es: No es católico.Creo que es metodista.

translation.en: But the guy practically lives at church. Choir, teaches Sunday school.
translation.es: Prácticamente vive en la iglesia.Canta en el coro, enseña catecismo.

translation.en: He's no choirboy in the courtroom. I've seen him tear people up.
translation.es: En la sala no es un niño cantor.Lo vi destruir gente.

translation.en: He's a shrewd son of a bitch.
translation.es: Es un sagaz hijo de perra.

translation.en: All right, pull him off whatever he's doing. He's lead prosecutor.
translation.es: Que deje lo que está haciendo.Será el fiscal.

translation.en: There's ambition. She never stops. She even works while she drinks.
translation.es: Esto es ambición. Nunca descansa,ni siquiera cuando bebe.

translation.en: -Gentlemen, you know Erin Bruner. -Of course.
-Hello. -I was so sure Van Hopper would fry...
translation.es: -Hola.-Pensé que Van Hopper iría a la silla.

translation.en: ...but you proved me wrong, lady.
The system worked, that's all.
Gentlemen, you'll excuse us, will you?
Have you seen the news about this priest?
I heard something about an exorcism gone bad, but I don't know the details.
translation.es: Supe de un exorcismo que resultómal, pero no conozco los detalles.

translation.en: The DA charged him with negligent homicide.
translation.es: El fiscal lo acusade homicidio negligente.

translation.en: They offered a very reasonable plea bargain, but the priest turned it down.
translation.es: Le ofrecieron un trato razonable,pero lo rechazó.

translation.en: Do not ask me to take this--
The archdiocese specifically requested you.
-Why me? -They followed the Van Hopper trial.
translation.es: -¿Por qué yo?-Siguieron el juicio de Van Hopper.

translation.en: They think you're smart...
...and convincing.
They want you to ask the priest to reconsider.
translation.es: Quieren que le pidas al sacerdoteque reconsidere.

translation.en: Well, what if he won't?
This sounds like a quagmire. If I'm smart, I'll leave it alone.
translation.es: Esto es un lodazal.Si soy lista, no debería aceptar.

translation.en: Erin, the Van Hopper case got you back on the fast track.
translation.es: Erin, el caso Van Hoppervolvió a ponerte al frente.

translation.en: Once again, you're a rising star.
-Chivas, neat, please. -Tanqueray martini, dry.
-What are you saying? -I'm saying, you do this for me...
translation.es: -¿De qué hablas?-Si haces esto por mí...

translation.en: ...and the rising star keeps rising.
The case is yours.
And just how high do I get to rise this time?
I've been junior partner for too long now, Karl.
translation.es: Fui socia minoritariadurante mucho tiempo, Karl.

translation.en: -It's not like other firms haven't called. -Erin--
I want my name on the door, right next to yours.
translation.es: Quiero mi nombre en la puerta,junto al tuyo.

translation.en: Okay.
Try to get the deal.
If the priest won't and this goes to trial...
...the archdiocese feels he could be an embarrassment.
So under no circumstances is he to testify.
No, of course. If I'd put Van Hopper on the stand...
translation.es: Claro que no. Si Van Hopperhubiera testificado...

translation.en: ...he'd be marking time on death row instead of sunbathing in Miami.
translation.es: ...estaría esperando su ejecución,en vez de tomar sol en Miami.

translation.en: His tab.
Good morning, I'm Erin Bruner.
May I sit down?
They brought the chair for my public defender.
translation.es: Trajeron la sillapara mi defensor público.

translation.en: I guess they left it when they decided I wasn't going to kill myself with it.
translation.es: Y la dejaron aquí al verque no me mataría con ella.

translation.en: My firm represents the archdiocese.
Yes.
Yes, I was expecting them to send someone.
-Why did they choose you? -I wanted this case.
translation.es: -¿Por qué la escogieron?-Yo quise el caso.

translation.en: -So you like the spotlight? -I'm used to it.
translation.es: -¿Le gusta ser el centro de atención?-Estoy acostumbrada.

translation.en: I defended James Van Hopper.
And now you've come to further your celebrity.
translation.es: Y vino a acrecentar su fama.

translation.en: I'm here to make senior partner at my firm.
translation.es: Quiero ser socia mayoritariade mi firma.

translation.en: -Are you a Catholic? -No.
I'm an agnostic, I guess. I'm not really sure.
If you're not sure, then you are one.
translation.es: Si no está segura, lo es.

translation.en: I don't think you're the right attorney. I'll stick with my public defender.
translation.es: No es la abogada adecuada.Seguiré con mi defensor público.

translation.en: He can't get the DA to get you a better deal. I can.
translation.es: Cerraré mejor trato con el fiscal.

translation.en: I won't be making any plea agreement.
If you don't, the archdiocese won't post your bail.
translation.es: La arquidiócesis no pagará su fianza.

translation.en: You'll be stuck in here for the trial.
Do you understand how long they can put you away?
It's been explained to me.
The DA's office doesn't like it when religion holds itself above the law.
translation.es: La Fiscalía no quiere que la religiónse ubique por sobre la ley.

translation.en: And this prosecutor, Ethan Thomas?
translation.es: Y con este fiscal, Ethan Thomas...

translation.en: You're gonna need somebody hungry and smart...
...and aggressive to even have a chance.
What would your strategy be to defend me against such a formidable man?
translation.es: ¿Con qué estrategia me defenderáde ese hombre tan formidable?

translation.en: -That depends. -On what?
On how you wanna be defended.
translation.es: De cómo quiera que lo defiendan.

translation.en: What's your main concern, other than staying out of jail?
translation.es: ¿Qué le preocupa,además de salir de prisión?

translation.en: -Is it how you're being portrayed? -I don't care about my reputation.
translation.es: -¿Lo que digan de usted?-No me importa mi reputación.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of jail.
translation.es: No le temo a la cárcel.

translation.en: What I care about is telling Emily Rose's story.
translation.es: Me interesa contarla historia de Emily Rose.

translation.en: I want people to hear what only I can tell.
translation.es: Quiero que la gente la escuche.

translation.en: And what is that?
What really happened to Emily...
...and why.
If I let you defend me...
...will you promise to let me testify and tell the truth about what happened?
translation.es: ...¿promete que me dejará testificary decir la verdad de lo ocurrido?

translation.en: And what is the truth you would tell? That the ritual killed her?
translation.es: ¿Y qué verdad contaría?¿Que el ritual la mató?

translation.en: -Was it your fault she died? -No.
All right. Then I'll let you tell her story.
But only if you agree to let me do whatever else it takes to win.
translation.es: ...sólo si acepta dejarme hacerlo necesario para ganar.

translation.en: You're not used to this kind of place.
translation.es: No está acostumbradaa esta clase de lugares.

translation.en: I'm sure our life is very strange to you.
Not so strange.
I grew up in a little town.
But our house wasn't as nice or as big as this.
translation.es: Mi casa no era tan bonitani grande como ésta.

translation.en: My mother, she raised me alone.
She was a schoolteacher, so we had very little money.
translation.es: Era maestra, así queteníamos poco dinero.

translation.en: What a wonderful thing to be.
That was Emily's dream, to be a teacher.
translation.es: Era el sueño de Emily,ser maestra.

translation.en: That's why she went away to the university.
translation.es: Por eso fue a la universidad.

translation.en: A lot of cats live here.
There are...
...11 now, I think.
Emily always brought them home.
Ever since she was a little girl, she couldn't leave a stray abandoned.
Before these troubles began...
...was Emily a happy girl?
Oh, yes.
Before she went away to university...
translation.es: Antes de ir a la universidad...

translation.en: ...my Emily was so very happy.
What is going on--? Girls!
Mama.
Is it--?
It's a scholarship, Mama.
They pay for it. They pay for everything.
This is your dream, Emily.
You'll be leaving us.
It's okay.
I'll be okay.
I'm gonna show this to your father.
translation.es: Se lo mostraré a tu padre.

translation.en: -Counselor. Thanks for meeting me. -Sure.
Can I buy you a drink, Mr. Thomas? He makes an excellent martini.
translation.es: ¿Le invito un trago, Sr. Thomas?Sirven un excelente martini.

translation.en: Just water for me, please.
So...
...the judge thinks we should offer a new plea agreement.
translation.es: ...la jueza cree que debemosofrecer un nuevo trato.

translation.en: She feels the community might be better served without this trial.
translation.es: Considera que sin el juicio,serviremos mejor a la comunidad.

translation.en: How do you feel about it?
Personally.
My job is to represent the interests of the people...
translation.es: Mi tarea es representarlos intereses del pueblo...

translation.en: ...and make an effort to be objective.
I ask because I know you're a churchgoer.
translation.es: Pregunto, porque séque va a misa...

translation.en: Now you're set to prosecute a man of God.
translation.es: ...y procesará a un hombre de Dios.

translation.en: Your priest broke the law...
...and a young girl is dead.
If he's a man of God, then, personally, I think he's even more subject...
translation.es: Si es hombre de Dios, personalmente,creo que debe someterse...

translation.en: ...to the laws of moral behavior. If it were up to me, he'd get no deal.
translation.es: ...a las leyes de conducta moral.Si por mí fuera, no haría trato.

translation.en: And forgiveness and compassion? Isn't that part of your creed?
translation.es: ¿El perdón y la compasiónno son parte de su credo?

translation.en: Or does that just get in the way of your work?
If you have compassion for your client...
...you'll persuade him to accept this:
Charges reduced to reckless endangerment.
translation.es: Cargo reducido a exposicióninvoluntaria al peligro.

translation.en: Twelve months in a county jail.
Reducible to six, plus probation, if he stays out of trouble.
translation.es: ...reducibles a seis,y libertad condicional si se porta bien.

translation.en: Somehow I expect he can manage that.
But please understand me. If he refuses, I will seek the maximum.
translation.es: Comprenda que si él se niega,solicitaré el máximo.

translation.en: Father Moore has made it clear there will be no plea agreement.
translation.es: El padre Moore dejó en claroque no hará tratos.

translation.en: He will not lie or admit to something he is not guilty of.
translation.es: No mentirá ni admitirá nadade lo que no sea culpable.

translation.en: -And he was never neglectful of Emily. -"Never neglectful"?
Have you seen the postmortem photographs?
We'll go to trial. My client wants the public to know the truth.
translation.es: Iremos a juicio. Mi clientedesea hacer pública la verdad.

translation.en: Good.
So do I.
Have a good night, counselor.
Let the record show that the defendant and his counsel are present...
translation.es: Conste en el informe que el acusadoy su abogada están presentes...

translation.en: ...and that the jury is seated.
-Mr. Thomas, you may begin. -Thank you, Your Honor.
Good morning, ladies and gentlemen. My name is Ethan Thomas.
translation.es: Buen día, damas y caballeros.Soy Ethan Thomas.

translation.en: I'm the assistant district attorney, and I represent the people.
translation.es: Soy el fiscal auxiliar,y represento al pueblo.

translation.en: In the case before you, the evidence will show...
translation.es: En el presente caso,la evidencia demostrará...

translation.en: ...that the victim had a serious medical condition that demanded treatment.
translation.es: ...que el estado médico de la víctimarequería tratamiento.

translation.en: We will prove that the victim's condition rendered her physically...
translation.es: Demostraremos que su enfermedadla incapacitó física...

translation.en: ...and psychologically incapable of caring for herself.
Her care...
...was then wholly entrusted...
...to that man, the defendant, Father Richard Moore.
translation.es: ...a ese hombre, el acusado,el padre Richard Moore.

translation.en: She became his responsibility...
...and he betrayed that responsibility...
...by persuading her to abandon her medical treatment...
translation.es: La convenció de abandonarel tratamiento médico...

translation.en: ...in favor of religious treatment:
A ritual exorcism, performed by the defendant...
translation.es: Un ritual de exorcismo,realizado por el acusado...

translation.en: ...allegedly to cure the victim by ridding her of demonic forces.
We will demonstrate that this course of action...
...directly resulted in the victim's death.
translation.es: ...desembocó directamenteen la muerte de la víctima.

translation.en: I said a moment ago that I represent the people.
translation.es: Hace un momento dijeque represento al pueblo.

translation.en: We all know what that means, but it's a little abstract, isn't it?
translation.es: Sabemos qué significa eso,pero es un poco abstracto.

translation.en: Miss Bruner, the attorney for the defense...
...is seated right next to the man she represents.
And I stand here to represent the people.
translation.es: Yo estoy parado aquí,para representar al pueblo.

translation.en: That's not really why I stand here today.
I'm here on behalf of someone who can't sit at a table...
translation.es: Vine en nombre de alguienque no puede sentarse a la mesa...

translation.en: ...and look at you every day and gain your sympathy...
translation.es: ...ni mirarlos a diarioy ganarse su simpatía...

translation.en: ...someone who can't take the stand to testify...
...and tell you what happened in her own words.
translation.es: ...y decir qué pasócon sus propias palabras.

translation.en: A young girl...
...that could've been your daughter.
Could've been mine.
A girl who trusted Father Richard Moore with her life.
translation.es: Una chica que le confió su vidaal padre Richard Moore.

translation.en: This is what she looked like...
...before the defendant began his religious treatment.
translation.es: ...antes de que el acusadocomenzara su tratamiento religioso.

translation.en: This is a photograph taken of her on the day that she died.
translation.es: Ésta es la foto que le tomaronel día de su muerte.

translation.en: I stand here for Emily Rose...
...who died horribly...
...at age 19.
You won't be able to see Emily sitting here day after day during this trial.
translation.es: No podrán ver a Emily sentada aquí,día a día durante el juicio.

translation.en: But I hope you'll remember her as she was when she was alive...
translation.es: Espero que recuerdencómo era cuando vivía...

translation.en: ...and full of...
...hopes and dreams.
And as she was when Father Richard Moore was finished with her...
translation.es: ...y cómo quedó cuandoel padre Moore acabó con ella...

translation.en: ...and left her to die.
Thank you.
Is the defense prepared to make its opening statement?
translation.es: ¿La defensa está listapara su declaración inaugural?

translation.en: I'd like to reserve my opening statement...
...until the presentation of the defense's case.
As is your privilege.
Prosecution may begin.
That was already my plan.
Thank you, Your Honor. The people call Dr. Edith Vogel.
translation.es: El pueblo llamaa la Dra. Edith Vogel.

translation.en: I've known Emily her entire life. I took care of all of the Rose girls.
translation.es: Conocí a Emily durante toda su vida.Cuidé de todas las niñas Rose.

translation.en: Can you describe Emily as you knew her growing up?
translation.es: ¿Puede describir a Emilyya que la vio crecer?

translation.en: She was a bit sickly in her early years.
She stayed inside a lot, reading, learning music.
How did she feel about going to school?
Objection. The witness is not a psychiatrist.
I'll rephrase. Did you talk to Emily about going off to college?
translation.es: Reformularé. ¿Emily le hablóde su ida a la universidad?

translation.en: Yes. She told me she was excited...
...but nervous that she would be away from her family in the big city.
translation.es: ...pero nerviosa de estar lejosde su familia, en la gran ciudad.

translation.en: This was an overwhelming change for her.
translation.es: Fue un cambio abrumador para ella.

translation.en: Did you stay in touch after she went away?
Yes. She wrote me a letter saying that she'd been to a dance...
translation.es: Sí, me escribió una carta,contándome de un baile...

translation.en: ...and she'd met a boy named Jason.
She didn't want her mother to know this...
translation.es: No quería que su madre lo supiera...

translation.en: ...because her mother did not approve of dancing...
...and had warned her about the boys at school.
translation.es: Y le había advertidoacerca de los chicos.

translation.en: Did Emily communicate with you again last fall after you received the letter?
translation.es: ¿Emily se comunicó despuésde que usted recibiera la carta?

translation.en: Actually, it was her mother.
She telephoned me...
...waking me out of a deep sleep at 4 in the morning.
translation.es: Me despertó a las 4:00 de la mañana.

translation.en: She asked me to call Emily at a payphone on the university campus.
translation.es: Me pidió que llamara a Emilya una cabina del campus.

translation.en: When Emily answered, she was quite hysterical.
At first, she just sobbed uncontrollably.
But eventually she calmed down enough to tell me what happened.
translation.es: Pero logró calmarsepara contarme lo ocurrido.

translation.en: She said that she was alone that weekend.
translation.es: Ese fin de semanahabía estado sola.

translation.en: Her roommate had gone home.
translation.es: Su compañera se había ido a casa.

translation.en: She had awakened...
...and thought she smelled something burning.
There was no alarm, but she got up...
translation.es: No sonó la alarma,pero se levantó...

translation.en: ...afraid there was a fire.
Dr. Mueller, what's your position at the university hospital?
translation.es: Dr. Mueller, ¿cuál es su cargoen el hospital universitario?

translation.en: I am chairman of the Department of Neurology.
And after you heard about the dorm-room incident...
translation.es: Al saber del incidenteen la habitación...

translation.en: ...what were your initial thoughts?
At first, I thought perhaps Emily had taken illegal drugs.
translation.es: Al principio pensé que Emilyhabía ingerido drogas ilegales.

translation.en: Some type of hallucinogen.
But we ran tests and found no trace of drugs in her system.
translation.es: Pero hicimos análisis,y no hubo rastros en su organismo.

translation.en: And the more she explained the incident to me...
...the more I began to suspect something else.
Epilepsy results from uncontrolled electrical activity in the brain.
translation.es: La epilepsia resulta de una actividadeléctrica descontrolada en el cerebro.

translation.en: In a severe, or grand mal, seizure...
translation.es: En un ataque severo o agudo...

translation.en: ...a person may lose consciousness for several minutes...
translation.es: ...se puede perder la concienciadurante varios minutos...

translation.en: ...and suffer involuntary contractions of all the muscles of the body.
translation.es: ...y sufrir contraccionesde los músculos del cuerpo.

translation.en: Is it possible for a person suffering such a seizure...
...to have hallucinations or perceive the things that Emily described?
translation.es: ...es posible alucinar o percibirlo que Emily describió?

translation.en: The muscle contractions could feel like an extreme pressure on the body.
translation.es: La contracción muscularpuede sentirse... ...como una presión sobre el cuerpo.

translation.en: And it is certainly possible, with all that brain activity...
...for a person to perceive all sorts of strange and violent things.
So suspecting that Emily was epileptic, how did you proceed?
translation.es: Al sospechar que era epiléptica,¿cómo procedió?

translation.en: I administered an electroencephalograph.
What did the EEG reveal?
It showed a possible epileptic focus in the patient's left temporal lobe.
translation.es: Un posible foco epilépticoen el lóbulo temporal izquierdo.

translation.en: Did this require a specific treatment?
Yes, I began a medication schedule for Emily with the drug Gambutrol.
I also advised regular follow-up examinations and further tests.
translation.es: Recomendé un seguimiento conexámenes regulares y adicionales.

translation.en: But Emily failed to keep her follow-up appointments with me.
translation.es: Pero Emily no acudióa las consultas programadas.

translation.en: She give any reason for discontinuing these appointments?
translation.es: ¿Justificó de algún modolas faltas a las consultas?

translation.en: Yes, she told me she was convinced that her condition was a spiritual one.
translation.es: Sí, dijo estar convencidade que su problema era espiritual.

translation.en: It was the conviction of her priest, she said, and she shared his beliefs.
translation.es: Eso creía su sacerdote,y ella compartió la creencia.

translation.en: Was it your impression that Emily had placed her care...
translation.es: ¿Tuvo la impresión de que Emilydejó su cuidado en manos...

translation.en: -...entirely--? -Leading the witness.
Sustained.
After the end of October...
...did you ask Emily why she had stopped...
...filling her Gambutrol prescriptions?
Yes. She said that Father Moore had suggested she stop taking the drug.
translation.es: Sí, dijo que el padre Moorele sugirió dejar el fármaco.

translation.en: And what, in your medical opinion...
...was the result of Father Moore's suggestion?
I believe Father Moore's suggestion killed her.
translation.es: Creo que su sugerencia la mató.

translation.en: Objection, Your Honor!
The witness is asserting outrageous conclusions based on pure hearsay.
translation.es: ¡La conclusión del testigose basa en habladurías!

translation.en: Technically correct, but I'll allow it as part of his expert opinion testimony.
translation.es: Técnicamente es correcta, perola tomaré como opinión de un experto.

translation.en: Thank you, Dr. Mueller.
Your witness.
You said you observed a possible epileptic focus in the temporal lobe.
translation.es: Observó un posible foco epilépticoen el lóbulo temporal.

translation.en: Doesn't this imply what you observed may not have been an epileptic focus?
translation.es: ¿No significa que podríano haber sido un foco epiléptico?

translation.en: Yes, that's also possible.
Would Father Moore's advice to stop taking Gambutrol be good advice...
translation.es: Y el consejo del padre Moorehubiera sido bueno...

translation.en: ...if Emily were, in fact, not epileptic?
Of course. But that's not the case here. She was epileptic.
translation.es: Por supuesto. Pero no es el caso.Ella era epiléptica.

translation.en: Really.
When Emily saw objects move on their own...
translation.es: Cuando Emily veía objetosque se movían solos...

translation.en: ...and felt an invisible presence on top of her...
...was she experiencing symptoms typical of epilepsy?
Not typical, no.
Are they typical indications of any other conditions?
-Say, for example, psychosis? -Yes, I would say that's correct.
translation.es: -¿Por ejemplo, psicosis?-Sí, diría que es correcto.

translation.en: But isn't psychosis an entirely different medical condition from epilepsy?
translation.es: ¿Pero la psicosis no es un cuadrototalmente diferente a la epilepsia?

translation.en: -Yes, in my-- -So aren't you selectively choosing...
...what parts of Emily's experiences fit your epilepsy diagnosis...
...while ignoring those which indicate something else?
translation.es: ...e ignora las que indican otra cosa?

translation.en: -Objection. Argumentative. -Withdrawn.
No further questions.
We have to work fast.
They're only giving me an hour with you tonight.
translation.es: Esta noche sólo me dieron una hora.

translation.en: Listen.
Before we get started, there's something I have to tell you...
...something I should've said to you before I let you take the case.
translation.es: ...algo que debí decirantes de que tomara el caso.

translation.en: Okay.
There are forces surrounding this trial.
Dark, powerful forces.
Just be careful, Erin. Watch your step.
I see.
Look--
Father, you don't have to worry about me.
translation.es: Padre, no se preocupe por mí.

translation.en: I'm an agnostic, remember?
Demons exist, whether you believe in them or not.
translation.es: Los demonios existenaunque no crea en ellos.

translation.en: Your involvement in this trial might just open you up to their attacks.
translation.es: Su participación podría convertirlaen blanco de sus ataques.

translation.en: Look, Father, I appreciate your concern...
...but you need to be worried about yourself.
Ethan Thomas is using the medical aspects of this case as ammunition...
translation.es: Ethan Thomas utiliza los aspectosmédicos como munición...

translation.en: ...and I have to be prepared for his attacks, so...
...with what little time we have, I think we need to focus on your defense.
translation.es: Con tan poco tiempo,debemos centrarnos en su defensa.

translation.en: Now, what I need from you is more information about Emily's condition.
translation.es: Necesito más informaciónacerca del cuadro de Emily.

translation.en: Specific details of how it progressed after the dorm-room episode.
translation.es: Detalles específicos del progreso,después del episodio en el dormitorio.

translation.en: Well, after the first incident...
...she was sent to the university hospital for testing and observation.
translation.es: ...la enviaron al hospitalpara examinarla y observarla.

translation.en: Emily once told me that in her dorm room, she resisted the demons...
translation.es: Una vez me dijo que en su habitación,se resistió a los demonios...

translation.en: ...but at the hospital they overcame her.
So she believed...
...that her possession began at the hospital?
Yeah, I think she did.
And after that, things just went from bad to worse.
translation.es: Después, todo fue de mal en peor.

translation.en: Emily!
Emily?
Oh, my God. Emily?
Don't touch me.
Jason, please...
...don't leave me.
And I never did leave her.
I stayed until the end.
So much of what we shared was like a nightmare...
translation.es: Casi todo lo que compartimosfue una pesadilla...

translation.en: ...but I wouldn't give up a single minute I spent with her.
translation.es: ...pero no renunciaríaa ningún minuto que pasé con ella.

translation.en: She woke me up, you know?
To things I never felt before, things I never knew I could feel.
translation.es: ...que nunca había sentido,que nunca pensé que podía sentir.

translation.en: I never knew how dead I was until I met her.
translation.es: Nunca supe lo muerto que estaba,hasta que la conocí.

translation.en: --residential north metro district where James Van Hopper...
translation.es: ...en el distrito residencial,donde James Van Hopper...

translation.en: ...acquitted after a controversial trial...
-Can you turn that up, please? -...has apparently struck again.
It was inside this quiet suburban home...
...that police say James Van Hopper murdered a young couple today.
translation.es: ...James Van Hopperasesinó a una joven pareja.

translation.en: Sources close to the investigation say that Van Hopper...
translation.es: Fuentes cercanas a la investigacióndicen que Van Hopper...

translation.en: ...who was acquitted of murder charges in April...
...may have known both of the victims.
Their names are being withheld pending family notification.
translation.es: No revelarán los nombreshasta notificar a la familia.

translation.en: Most glorious prince of the heavenly army...
...holy Michael, the archangel...
...defend us in battle against the princes...
...powers and rulers of darkness.
Counsel Bruner, my courtroom day begins at 9:30 a.m.
translation.es: Abogada Bruner, mi salaabre a las 9:30 a.m.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Your Honor, I-- -Which was 17 minutes ago.
translation.es: -Lo siento, Su Señoría, yo...-Eso fue hace 17 minutos.

translation.en: Ready to proceed?
Yes, Your Honor.
Dr. Briggs, please state your qualifications for the court.
translation.es: Dr. Briggs, enunciesus títulos al tribunal.

translation.en: I have advanced degrees in medicine...
...psychiatry and neurology from Johns Hopkins...
translation.es: ...psiquiatría y neurologíade la universidad Johns Hopkins...

translation.en: ...and I have had three books and several dozen papers published...
...in the fields of neurology and neuropsychiatry.
translation.es: ...en el campo de la neurologíay la neuropsiquiatría.

translation.en: What was the cause of death, as determined by the autopsy?
translation.es: ¿Cuál fue la causa de muertedeterminada por la autopsia?

translation.en: The decedent expired due to a gradual shutdown of the bodily functions.
translation.es: La difunta murió por un cese gradualde las funciones corporales.

translation.en: Why did her body shut down?
The autopsy found that it was a cumulative effect...
translation.es: Según la autopsia,se acumuló el efecto...

translation.en: ...from numerous physical traumas exacerbated by malnutrition...
translation.es: ...de diversos traumas físicos,exacerbados por una desnutrición...

translation.en: ...which severely inhibited her ability to recuperate from those traumas.
translation.es: ...que inhibió su capacidadpara recuperarse de los traumas.

translation.en: In other words, her starving body had little or no means to recover...
translation.es: En otras palabras, su cuerpono tenía medios para recuperarse...

translation.en: ...from the injuries it was sustaining, and so it eventually just gave out.
translation.es: ...de las heridas que soportaba,y finalmente se rindió.

translation.en: How did Emily get these injuries?
Some were the result of violent epileptic seizures...
translation.es: Algunas fueron resultadode violentos ataques epilépticos...

translation.en: ...and some were self-inflicted.
And why, in your opinion, did Emily injure herself...
translation.es: En su opinión,¿por qué se agredió a sí misma...

translation.en: ...and why did she stop eating?
Upon review of her complete medical file...
...I concluded that Emily's epilepsy had evolved...
...into a condition known as psychotic epileptic disorder.
This is a rare development, to be sure...
...but one that I have witnessed numerous times.
-Emily was epileptic and psychotic? -Yes.
Explain how this psychotic epileptic disorder would manifest itself.
translation.es: Explique cómo se manifiestaeste desorden psicótico epiléptico.

translation.en: The seizures would have the symptoms of schizophrenia...
...such as auditory and visual hallucinations...
...and sometimes extreme paranoia.
The seizures may lock up the joints and slightly contort the body.
translation.es: Se paralizan las articulacionesy el cuerpo se retuerce.

translation.en: The pupils will dilate, making the eyes appear black.
translation.es: La dilatación de pupilashace que los ojos parezcan negros.

translation.en: So you believe that Emily had epilepsy...
...which developed into a form of violent psychosis...
...a condition that can be controlled with Gambutrol?
Yes. And it would've been, if she'd continued her treatment.
translation.es: Sí. Así hubiera sidosi continuaba su tratamiento.

translation.en: In your opinion, if Emily had continued with her medication...
-...would she be alive today? -Absolutely.
If treated early, psychotic epileptic disorder is rarely fatal.
translation.es: Tratado a tiempo, el desordenpsicótico epiléptico no es fatal.

translation.en: I mean, this--
This was a very sick girl.
The defendant should've realized that Emily was in need...
translation.es: El acusado debió advertirque Emily necesitaba...

translation.en: ...of continued medical treatment.
Thank you, doctor. Your witness.
Doctor, you testified that Gambutrol could've controlled Emily's condition.
translation.es: Doctor, declaró que el Gambutrolpudo controlar el cuadro de Emily.

translation.en: How do you know that?
It's the inevitable result of taking the drug.
translation.es: Es el resultado de tomar el fármaco.

translation.en: It would've controlled her seizures...
...which were the root cause of her psychosis.
translation.es: ...que eran la raíz de su psicosis.

translation.en: But wasn't Emily still experiencing psychotic symptoms...
...even after she started taking the medication?
Yes. Because Gambutrol has a cumulative effect.
translation.es: Sí, porque el Gambutroles de efecto acumulativo.

translation.en: It takes time to build up in the system.
You assume that Gambutrol would've helped her, but you don't know.
translation.es: Entonces supone que el Gambutrolhubiera ayudado, pero no lo sabe.

translation.en: It's a reasonable assumption, but....
No, of course, I can't be certain.
translation.es: Pero no, no puedo estar seguro.

translation.en: Doctor, is "psychotic epileptic disorder" a common medical term...
translation.es: Doctor, ¿el "desorden psicóticoepiléptico" es un término médico...

translation.en: ...or did you just make it up?
Well, I distinguished and named the--
translation.es: Yo lo identifiqué y le puse nombre.

translation.en: So psychotic epileptic disorder is really your own pet theory?
-Objection. Argumentative. -Sustained.
When Emily chose to stop her medical treatment...
...what do you think should've been done?
Upon recognizing her condition...
...I would have tranquilized her and force-fed her.
translation.es: ...la hubiera sedadoy la hubiera alimentado a la fuerza.

translation.en: And then, if necessary...
...I would've treated her with electroconvulsive therapy.
Electroshock treatment. You would've done this against her will?
To save her life?
Absolutely.
Nothing further.
The witness may step down.
Your Honor, I offer into evidence this photograph as People's Exhibit 3-A.
translation.es: Su Señoría, incorporo esta fotografíacomo evidencia 3-A.

translation.en: And having done so, the people rest.
The photograph is entered into evidence.
We are recessed until tomorrow morning, 9:30 sharp...
translation.es: Habrá receso hasta mañanaa las 9:30 en punto.

translation.en: ...at which time the defense will give its opening statement...
...and call its first witness.
I'm sorry I was late.
I didn't get a lot of sleep. Big power outage knocked out my alarm clock.
translation.es: No dormí suficiente y un corte de luzdesajustó mi despertador.

translation.en: -It won't happen again. -No, I didn't sleep either.
What kept you awake?
Doesn't matter.
You're under attack.
What are you talking about?
You're in a spiritual battle, Erin.
The forces of darkness are trying to keep you away from the light.
translation.es: Las fuerzas de la oscuridadintentan alejarla de la luz.

translation.en: Don't let them.
Don't worry about today. We're doing fine.
translation.es: No se preocupe por lo de hoy.Vamos bien.

translation.en: We're getting creamed. I can't believe I walked right into that.
translation.es: Nos hicieron papilla.¿Cómo me metí en eso?

translation.en: Look, if we don't find a doctor to testify that Emily...
translation.es: Si no hallamos un doctorque declare que Emily...

translation.en: ...wasn't epileptic or schizophrenic or schizo-epileptic, we're gonna lose.
translation.es: ...no era epiléptica, esquizofrénicao ambas cosas, perderemos.

translation.en: Care of the city's main branch and the university library...
translation.es: Enviados por las bibliotecasmunicipal y universitaria...

translation.en: ...I bring you another dozen fun-filled books...
...about the demonic and the mentally deranged.
They burned women at the stake...
...during witch hunts for being possessed.
Glad you don't have to defend those guys.
translation.es: Me alegra que no las defiendas.

translation.en: -How are we on our medical experts? -Not good.
translation.es: -¿Cómo va lo del experto médico?-No muy bien.

translation.en: The psychiatrist you wanted is tied up in another trial.
translation.es: El psiquiatra que deseasestá ocupado en otro juicio.

translation.en: And the neurologist is sailing to Costa Rica.
translation.es: Y el neurólogo,navega hacia Costa Rica.

translation.en: This book I'm reading, it's by an anthropologist.
translation.es: Este libro es de una antropóloga.

translation.en: It's about contemporary cases of possession, mostly in the Third World.
translation.es: Casos contemporáneos de posesión,mayormente en el Tercer Mundo.

translation.en: People there are still primitive and superstitious.
Maybe.
Maybe they see possession for what it really is.
translation.es: Tal vez ellos ven la posesióntal como es.

translation.en: Maybe we've taught ourselves not to see it.
translation.es: Tal vez nos enseñaron a no verla.

translation.en: -You saying you believe in this stuff? -No.
Maybe we shouldn't just try to invalidate the prosecution's case...
translation.es: Tal vez no deberíamos invalidarel caso de la Fiscalía...

translation.en: ...by punching holes in the medical approach.
Maybe we should also try to validate the alternative.
-Validate possession in a court of law? -Yes.
Okay. I guess we could bring in some priests to talk about exorcisms--
translation.es: Podríamos llevar sacerdotesque hablen acerca de exorcismos...

translation.en: No, the archdiocese won't let us do that.
They wanna limit the Church's exposure to Father Moore.
translation.es: Quieren que la exposiciónse limite al padre Moore.

translation.en: I've got three articles by the anthropologist who wrote this book.
translation.es: Tengo tres artículos de la antropólogaque escribió este libro.

translation.en: She approaches the subject of possession...
translation.es: Aborda el tema de la posesión...

translation.en: ...from a scientific perspective and doesn't try to debunk it.
translation.es: ...desde una perspectiva científicay no la desacredita.

translation.en: -You want me to track her down? -Yeah.
Keep looking for a medical expert to refute Dr. Briggs.
translation.es: Sigue buscando un expertoque refute al Dr. Briggs.

translation.en: But send the case file to this Dr. Sadira Adani.
translation.es: Envía el expediente del casoa esta Dra. Sadira Adani.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury...
...as you know by now, my name is Erin Bruner...
...and I represent the defendant, Richard Moore.
Mr. Thomas has contended that Emily Rose suffered...
translation.es: El Sr. Thomas sostieneque Emily Rose sufría...

translation.en: ...from a serious medical condition...
...that required medical treatment, nothing more.
He has asserted that any attempt by my client...
...to help Emily by anything other than medical means...
...was not only inappropriate, but criminally negligent.
I'm now gonna ask that you keep an open mind...
translation.es: Les pido que tengan mente abierta...

translation.en: ...to what our evidence and testimony will show.
translation.es: ...para lo que mostraránuestra evidencia y testimonio.

translation.en: Medical treatment was not the answer for Emily...
translation.es: El tratamiento médicono era la respuesta para Emily...

translation.en: ...because she simply did not suffer from a medical condition.
She was neither epileptic nor psychotic.
Emily Rose's condition, in fact, was demonic possession.
translation.es: Lo que Emily Rose tuvo,fue una posesión demoníaca.

translation.en: An exorcism was her only hope for a cure.
translation.es: El exorcismo erasu única esperanza de cura.

translation.en: Some of you may find yourself unable to reconcile Emily's beliefs...
translation.es: Alguno de ustedes se sentirá incapazde conciliar la creencia de Emily...

translation.en: ...or those of the defendant with your own.
translation.es: ...o la del acusado,con las suyas propias.

translation.en: You may not believe demons exist. You won't have to.
translation.es: Tal vez no crean queexistan demonios. No hace falta.

translation.en: Because you will see that after the utter failure of doctors to help Emily...
translation.es: Porque verán que tras el fracasode los doctores...

translation.en: ...Father Moore simply tried to help Emily in a different way...
translation.es: ...el padre Moore intentó ayudarcon un método...

translation.en: ...using an approach that he, Emily and her family firmly believed...
translation.es: ...que según la firme creenciade Emily y su familia...

translation.en: ...was her only chance for relief.
And we will show that despite his greatest efforts...
translation.es: Y mostraremos que a pesarde sus grandes esfuerzos...

translation.en: ...and his sincere love for Emily...
translation.es: ...y de su sincero amor por Emily...

translation.en: ...there was nothing he could've done to prevent the death of Emily Rose.
translation.es: ...no podía hacer nada para evitarla muerte de Emily Rose.

translation.en: Are you okay?
Aren't you gonna eat anything?
She said it was terrible to hear the clinking of spoons and forks.
translation.es: Dijo que era terrible escucharel chirrido de tenedores y cucharas.

translation.en: She was always hungry, but she said they wouldn't let her eat.
translation.es: Siempre tenía hambre, pero decíaque no la dejaban comer.

translation.en: Who did she mean by "they"?
The forces that were in control of her.
That were inside her.
You know, the demons.
Tell us what else happened that night.
I walked her back to her dorm...
...and she seemed really nervous and scared.
So I held her for a while, trying to calm her down.
translation.es: Me quedé un momentopara intentar calmarla.

translation.en: I fell asleep, but when I woke up, she wasn't beside me.
translation.es: Me quedé dormido, y al despertarno estaba a mi lado.

translation.en: Emily?
Hey.
Can you hear me?
I called her father, and he told me to bring Emily home.
translation.es: Llamé a su padre, quien me dijoque la llevara a su casa.

translation.en: Jason and I put Emily to bed...
translation.es: Jason y yo la pusimos en la cama...

translation.en: ...hoping she would sleep.
And when did Father Moore become involved?
Emily stayed home after that.
She didn't return to school, and she kept getting worse.
translation.es: No regresó a la universidad,y siguió empeorando.

translation.en: Eventually, when she didn't get better, we called our priest, Father Moore.
translation.es: Al no haber mejoría, llamamosa nuestro sacerdote, el padre Moore.

translation.en: When he arrived, I sent my daughter Alice upstairs...
translation.es: Cuando llegó, mi hija Alice subió...

translation.en: ...to see if Emily was awake.
Emily?
Can I come in?
-Our Father, who art in heaven-- -Emily?
Father Moore is here. Can you come downstairs?
translation.es: Llegó el padre Moore.¿Puedes venir abajo?

translation.en: --as it is in heaven.
Give us this day our daily bread....
translation.es: El pan nuestro de cada día...

translation.en: Emily, can you hear me?
Let's get her off the floor.
Alice, no!
I am the one who dwells within.
And I am the one who comes in His name.
translation.es: Yo soy el que viene en su nombre.

translation.en: Think you can force me out, priest?
Try.
I dare you.
You've suffered a terrible loss, Mr. Rose. I know this is difficult.
translation.es: Sufrió una pérdida terrible, Sr. Rose.Sé que es difícil.

translation.en: So thank you for being here today.
Sir, do you often read the Bible?
-Yes, I do. -So do I.
What about the DSM?
The Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders...
translation.es: Manual de Diagnóstico y Estadísticade Desórdenes Mentales...

translation.en: ...commonly referred to as the bible of abnormal psychiatry.
-Have you read that? -No.
So you're not aware that according to the DSM...
...a person's refusal to eat is a common indication of anorexia?
translation.es: ...rehusarse a comeres un indicativo de anorexia?

translation.en: Objection. The witness just said he hasn't read the DSM, Your Honor.
translation.es: ¡Objeción! El testigo dijoque no leyó el MDE.

translation.en: -Sustained. -Mr. Rose...
...are you aware that catatonic rigidity...
...specifically a locking up of the body's joints...
...is a known symptom of psychosis?
No. I haven't studied these things.
Have you ever visited an insane asylum...
...or a hospital for the mentally ill?
Once. My aunt was in one before she died.
translation.es: Mi tía estuvo en unoantes de morir.

translation.en: Really? So there's a history of mental illness in your family?
I suppose.
Sir, if you saw someone eating insects...
translation.es: Señor, si viera a alguiencomiendo insectos...

translation.en: ...on a street corner, would you say that that person is mentally ill?
-Probably, yes. -So can you say with confidence...
...that the behavior you saw in your daughter's bedroom...
translation.es: ...que lo que vioen el dormitorio de su hija...

translation.en: ...could not be the behavior of someone suffering from psychosis?
translation.es: ...¿no era el comportamientode alguien que sufre psicosis?

translation.en: I don't know. She never had any problems like that before.
translation.es: No lo sé. Nunca había tenidoproblemas como ése.

translation.en: It just didn't feel that way to me or to Father Moore.
translation.es: No sentimos eso,ni yo ni el padre Moore.

translation.en: -And you trusted him, right? -Yes.
He is our parish priest.
Fair enough. And after that night, would you say that you...
translation.es: Y después de esa noche,¿diría que usted...

translation.en: ...put your daughter entirely in Father Moore's care?
translation.es: ...puso a su hijaal cuidado del Padre Moore?

translation.en: Yes. We had done all we could.
We said she was in his hands now...
...body and soul.
Thank you. No further questions, Your Honor.
Thank you, Mr. Rose. You may step down.
The defense calls Dr. Sadira Adani.
translation.es: La defensa llamaa la Dra. Sadira Adani.

translation.en: I am currently a professor of anthropology and psychiatry...
...at Northwestern University.
Where did you receive your education?
At Yale, and then at Cambridge.
translation.es: En Yale, y luego en Cambridge.

translation.en: And what is your specific area of expertise?
I study the spiritual experiences of people in various cultures...
translation.es: Estudio experiencias espiritualesde gente en diversas culturas...

translation.en: ...and the physiological and psychological changes...
...they undergo during these experiences.
Would it be accurate to say that you specialize in the study of possession?
translation.es: ¿Se especializa en el estudiocientífico de la posesión?

translation.en: Yes. "Possession" is one term for a basic human experience...
translation.es: Sí. "Posesión" es el término parauna experiencia humana básica...

translation.en: ...reported by a great number of people all around the world.
translation.es: ...informada por un gran númerode gente en todo el mundo.

translation.en: In my fieldwork, I've seen many people who experienced...
translation.es: He visto mucha genteque experimentó la sensación...

translation.en: ...a sense of being invaded by an entity from the supernatural realm.
translation.es: ...de ser invadida por una entidadde un reino sobrenatural.

translation.en: Why do you think Emily was invaded?
Why did this possession happen to her?
Based on my study of the case file...
...I believe that Emily Rose was a hypersensitive.
A person with an unusual connection...
...to what Carlos Castaneda called "the separate reality."
translation.es: ...con lo que Carlos Castaneda llamó"la realidad separada".

translation.en: Hypersensitives are born different from everyone else.
translation.es: Los hipersensibles nacen diferentesa todos los demás.

translation.en: They can have visions of the future, or see the dead...
translation.es: Tienen visiones del futuro,o ven la muerte...

translation.en: ...and sometimes be uniquely susceptible...
...to invasion by an entity that is alien to them.
translation.es: ...a la invasión de una entidadajena a ellos.

translation.en: Objection.
On what grounds?
How about silliness, Your Honor?
A young girl suffered terribly and died.
Do we have to subject her illness to this pseudoscientific analysis?
translation.es: ¿Debemos someter su enfermedada un análisis pseudo científico?

translation.en: Both counselors, please approach the bench.
Your Honor, this testimony is beyond ridiculous. Visions--
translation.es: Su Señoría, este testimoniosupera lo ridículo.

translation.en: Supernatural belief systems are shared by millions of people.
translation.es: Hay millones que compartensistemas de creencia sobrenatural.

translation.en: We're in The Twilight Zone here.
Her expertise is relevant to the issues in this case.
translation.es: Su experiencia es relevantepara el tema del caso.

translation.en: Let's have a witch doctor sift through bones--
translation.es: Traigamos un curanderoque busque entre los huesos...

translation.en: Stop.
We've heard a great deal of testimony...
...in support of a medical explanation for Emily's condition.
Now we have a witness who has spent her career...
translation.es: Tenemos una testigoque pasó su carrera...

translation.en: ...studying the defense's alternative explanation.
An exorcism expert, if you will.
I think we'll hear what she has to say.
translation.es: Escuchemos lo que tenga para decir.

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
Dr. Adani, why do you think Emily's exorcism failed?
translation.es: Dra. Adani, ¿por qué fracasóel exorcismo de Emily?

translation.en: The medical treatment. Specifically, the drug Gambutrol.
translation.es: Por el tratamiento médico,específicamente, el Gambutrol.

translation.en: Please explain.
The exorcism ritual results in a specific brain activity...
...that cuts the person off from the possession experience.
translation.es: ...que separa a la persona,de la experiencia de posesión.

translation.en: But Emily's exorcism could not have achieved this...
...because the doctor gave her Gambutrol...
...which has an intoxicating effect on the brain.
The drug made her immune to the psycho-spiritual shock...
translation.es: El fármaco la dejó inmuneal shock psico-espiritual...

translation.en: ...that exorcism is intended to provide.
What do you believe was the result of treatment with this intoxicating drug?
translation.es: ¿Cuál fue el resultadode este fármaco tóxico?

translation.en: Gambutrol locked Emily in the possessed state.
translation.es: El Gambutrol la dejó bloqueadaen su estado de posesión.

translation.en: This left her unable to respond to the exorcism...
translation.es: Le quitó la capacidadde responder al exorcismo...

translation.en: ...and therefore, it directly contributed to her death.
No further questions.
Erin!
I've got a doctor who wants to testify.
He's an eyewitness, Erin.
He was there. He was at the exorcism.
-What? -He called us.
Dr. Graham Cartwright, Department of Abnormal Psychiatry...
translation.es: El Dr. Graham Cartwright,Depto. de Psiquiatría Anormal...

translation.en: ...at St. Mary's Hospital.
Dr. Cartwright. Ring a bell?
Yes.
He was there?
-Yes. -Father...
...if you want me to defend you, you've got to give me...
...all the information I need.
With all of this medical testimony helping the prosecution...
translation.es: Con tanto testimonio médicoa favor del fiscal...

translation.en: ...how could you not tell me that a doctor attended the exorcism?
translation.es: ...¿por qué no dijo que un médicopresenció el exorcismo?

translation.en: He asked that I keep his involvement confidential...
translation.es: Me pidió que su participaciónfuera confidencial...

translation.en: ...and I said I would.
Dr. Cartwright?
I recognize you from those courtroom drawings on the news.
translation.es: La reconozco de los juiciosque muestran en las noticias.

translation.en: You're much prettier in real life.
translation.es: Es mucho más bonita en persona.

translation.en: -May I sit? -Yes, please.
You're losing.
I had hoped Father Moore wouldn't need me...
translation.es: Esperaba que el padre Mooreno me necesitara...

translation.en: ...but I don't wanna see him put away.
How do you know him?
Well, I was his parishioner at St. Vincent's Church...
translation.es: Fui su feligrésen la iglesia de St. Vincent...

translation.en: ...about 15 years ago.
I hadn't seen or heard of him for years when he called me last fall.
translation.es: Pasaron años sin vernos,hasta que me llamó en otoño.

translation.en: But he needed help, so....
What kind of help, doctor?
He wanted a medical perspective from a psychiatrist...
...you know, one that he knew, trusted...
...to observe Emily's physical and mental state during this....
translation.es: ...para observar el estado físicode Emily durante...

translation.en: During the exorcism.
Yeah.
Can you help our case?
That girl was not schizophrenic...
...and she was not epileptic, or any combination of the two.
translation.es: ...no era epiléptica,ni una combinación de ambas.

translation.en: I've seen hundreds of people with those problems.
translation.es: Vi cientos de personascon esos problemas.

translation.en: They can be terrible afflictions, of course, but they don't scare me.
translation.es: Son aflicciones terribles,pero no me asustan.

translation.en: But what you saw that night in Emily, that did scare you.
translation.es: Pero lo que vio aquella noche,sí lo asustó.

translation.en: God, if I'd known, I never would've been there.
translation.es: Dios, de haberlo sabido,nunca hubiera ido.

translation.en: I started praying again since then, you know.
I examined that girl before I drove back to the city that night.
translation.es: Examiné a la chicaantes de regresar a la ciudad.

translation.en: She was lucid...
...and she was completely aware of this separate entity inside her.
translation.es: ...completamente conscientede esta otra entidad dentro suyo.

translation.en: When she wasn't in his grip, she was totally herself, completely normal.
translation.es: Cuando no estaba bajo su control... ...era ella misma,completamente normal.

translation.en: The awareness of her alternate mental state is counterindicative of psychosis.
translation.es: Percibir su otro estado mental,no corresponde con la psicosis.

translation.en: Crazy people don't know they're crazy.
translation.es: Los locos no saben que están locos.

translation.en: That's right.
You'll testify to all of this, in detail?
Everything you saw?
Send me the case files and tell me when to be in court.
translation.es: Envíeme el expedientey dígame cuándo ir a la corte.

translation.en: Thank you, doctor.
We need this.
Before he was arrested, Father Moore sent this to me.
translation.es: Antes de que lo arrestaran,el padre Moore me envió esto.

translation.en: He asked me to take care of it.
It's your burden now.
One more thing. When you saw Emily...
translation.es: Algo más. Cuando vio a Emily...

translation.en: ...did Father Moore ask you to give her any medical help?
He was already trying to stop her from injuring herself and urging her to eat.
translation.es: Él intentaba que dejara de lacerarsey la incitaba a comer.

translation.en: And I told him, as a doctor, I couldn't help her.
translation.es: Le dije que como doctor,no podía ayudarla.

translation.en: Dr. Cartwright's going to testify.
Don't you get it?
He's not just an eyewitness to the exorcism.
translation.es: No es un mero testigo del exorcismo.

translation.en: He can also refute the prosecution's medical case. This is huge for us.
translation.es: Refutará el testimonio médicodel fiscal. Es grandioso.

translation.en: When do I get to testify?
I don't know. Let's take this one step at a time.
translation.es: No lo sé.Vayamos paso a paso.

translation.en: What matters most is Emily's story, which only I can tell.
translation.es: Lo más importante es la historiade Emily, que sólo yo puedo contar.

translation.en: I understand.
Have you thought about what I said before?
translation.es: ¿Pensó en lo que le dije antes?

translation.en: About dark forces and demonic attacks?
Yes, I have.
That day, after Briggs testified...
...I was feeling awful.
And I went out for a walk just to clear my head...
translation.es: Salí a caminarpara despejar mi mente...

translation.en: ...and I was thinking about what you said to me. Thinking:
translation.es: ...y pensé en lo que me dijo.

translation.en: "What if demons really do exist?"
And wondering what that would mean if I believed that.
translation.es: Me preguntaba qué significaríacreer en eso.

translation.en: Because God knows, I have my own demons.
translation.es: Porque Dios sabe,que tengo mis propios demonios.

translation.en: And I saw something lying on the sidewalk.
translation.es: Entonces vi algo sobre la acera.

translation.en: It was a gold locket...
...with the initials E.C.B. engraved on it.
My middle name is Christine.
And of all the people walking by that day, I found that locket.
translation.es: De todos los que pasaron por ahí,yo hallé la medalla.

translation.en: What are the chances of that?
I don't know, maybe it was a sign.
Or maybe it was just some incredible coincidence.
But it made me feel...
...like no matter what mistakes I've made in the past...
...at that moment, I was exactly where I was meant to be.
translation.es: ...en ese momento, yo estabadonde debía estar.

translation.en: Like I was on the right path.
translation.es: Como si fuera por el buen camino.

translation.en: You sound more like a mystic than an agnostic.
Are you wearing the locket now?
You should.
The archdiocese doesn't want you to testify.
They're just afraid that I'll embarrass them.
Testify to some medieval-sounding supernatural nonsense.
translation.es: Dar testimonio de un absurdosobrenatural de la Edad Media.

translation.en: They're expecting me to talk you out of it.
I've just decided I'm not even gonna try.
Why not?
If the archdiocese wants to avoid embarrassment...
translation.es: Si la arquidiócesisdesea evitar el bochorno...

translation.en: ...they need you to walk out of here a free man.
I believe a jury will find you sincere and credible...
translation.es: Creo que el juradolo hallará sincero y creíble...

translation.en: ...and when Dr. Cartwright corroborates your testimony...
translation.es: ...y cuando el Dr. Cartwrightcorrobore su testimonio...

translation.en: ...and refutes the prosecution's medical arguments...
translation.es: ...y refute los argumentos médicosde la fiscalía...

translation.en: ...we'll get an acquittal.
And everyone will thank me for it.
Emily!
Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth, so help you God?
translation.es: ¿Jura decir la verdad,y nada más que la verdad?

translation.en: I do.
Father Moore, before you could perform the exorcism...
...you had to get the sanction of the Church, correct?
Yes, on October the 27th of last year...
translation.es: Sí, el 27 de octubredel año pasado...

translation.en: ...I presented my assessment and recommendation to the archbishop...
...and he authorized the exorcism that day before I left his office.
translation.es: ...y ese día autorizó el exorcismoantes de que yo dejara su oficina.

translation.en: Tell us what happened that night.
I drove home.
I sat up till after midnight studying The Roman Ritual...
translation.es: Me quedé hasta medianocheestudiando The Roman Ritual...

translation.en: ...thinking about what lay ahead.
You mean The Roman Ritual of Exorcism.
A text used by Catholic priests...
...as a guide to performing the exorcism rite.
Yes, I think I actually fell asleep with the book in my hand.
translation.es: Sí, creo que me quedé dormidocon el libro en la mano.

translation.en: What happened next?
I woke up, freezing.
It was exactly 3 a.m.
Three a.m. is the demonic witching hour.
translation.es: Las 3:00 a.m. es la horade la brujería demoníaca.

translation.en: It's a way for demons to mock the Holy Trinity.
translation.es: Es una forma de burlarsede la Santa Trinidad.

translation.en: It's an inversion of 3 p.m., the miracle hour...
translation.es: Es el opuesto a las 3:00 p.m.,hora milagrosa...

translation.en: ...which is traditionally accepted as the hour of Christ's death.
translation.es: ...tradicionalmente aceptadacomo la hora de la muerte de Cristo.

translation.en: I thought I smelled something burning.
Only later did I connect it...
...and I remembered that that same smell of something burning...
...had been perceived by Emily.
Holy Mary, mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and--
translation.es: Santa María, madre de Dios,ruega por nosotros pecadores...

translation.en: Pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our--
translation.es: Ruega por nosotros pecadores,ahora y en la hora...

translation.en: At the hour of--
What do you make of this gesture, this nod in your direction?
translation.es: ¿Qué le significó ese gestoen dirección a usted?

translation.en: I don't know. Some kind of acknowledgment, I guess.
translation.es: No lo sé. Una especie de aviso...

translation.en: That the game is on.
You're really God's gunslinger, aren't you, Father?
translation.es: Padre, usted es un pistolerode Dios, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Standing tall and facing the devil with your prayer book at your side.
translation.es: Erguido frente al diablo,con su libro de oraciones en mano.

translation.en: Objection, Your Honor. Counsel's harassing my witness.
Sustained. Mr. Thomas, you know I won't allow that in my courtroom.
translation.es: Ha lugar. Sr. Thomas,no se lo permitiré en mi tribunal.

translation.en: Forgive me, Your Honor.
Father, did you understand this black-robed figure to be the devil?
translation.es: Padre, ¿dice que esta figuravestida de negro era el demonio?

translation.en: I believe it was a demonic manifestation.
Like the demonic force you believe possessed Emily?
translation.es: ¿Como la fuerza demoníacaque habría poseído a Emily?

translation.en: -Yes. -Why do you think it appeared to you?
translation.es: -Sí.-¿Por qué se le apareció a usted?

translation.en: I believe the demonic can appear as an apparition...
...much like a ghost, in an attempt to excite our fear.
translation.es: ...como aparición o fantasmapara avivar nuestro miedo.

translation.en: -Did it excite your fear, Father? -It scared the hell out of me.
translation.es: -¿Avivó su miedo, Padre?-Me morí de terror.

translation.en: So this night, when you began to prepare Emily's exorcism...
translation.es: La noche en que comenzó a prepararel exorcismo de Emily...

translation.en: ...was it your first encounter with this demon ghost?
translation.es: ...¿fue su primer encuentrocon este fantasma demoníaco?

translation.en: -Yes. -Have you seen it again?
I've seen it ever since.
No further questions at this time.
Redirect, Your Honor.
Father Moore, after you received the bishop's authorization...
translation.es: Padre Moore, tras la autorizacióndel arzobispo...

translation.en: ...when did you proceed with an exorcism?
October 31st.
On Halloween. Isn't that a bit dramatic?
translation.es: Durante la Noche de Brujas.¿No es un poco dramático?

translation.en: Halloween tradition is based on legends throughout history...
translation.es: La tradición de la Noche de Brujasse basa en leyendas...

translation.en: ...that indicate a real increase in spiritual activity on that night...
translation.es: ...que indican un aumentode la actividad espiritual...

translation.en: ...and I thought we could use the occasion to draw them into the open.
translation.es: ...y pensé en usar la ocasiónpara incitarlos a mostrarse.

translation.en: -The demons, you mean? -Yes.
Father Moore...
...can you identify this?
It's my tape recorder. I used it to record the exorcism.
translation.es: Es mi grabadora de cinta.La usé para grabar el exorcismo.

translation.en: Inside is the tape I made that night.
translation.es: Contiene la cintaque grabé esa noche.

translation.en: Why would you make such a tape?
Ever since the technology has been available...
...exorcists have used tape recorders to authenticate the ritual...
translation.es: ...los exorcistas usaron grabadoraspara autenticar el ritual...

translation.en: ...and provide a record for review.
I offer into evidence this cassette recorder and audiotape....
translation.es: Ofrezco como evidenciaesta grabadora y su cinta...

translation.en: Objection. The people were not aware of the existence of this tape...
translation.es: Objeción. No supimos de la existenciade esta cinta...

translation.en: -...until last night. -Neither were we.
This tape is new evidence that came into our possession yesterday.
translation.es: Esta cinta es evidencia nuevaque cayó en mis manos ayer.

translation.en: We provided counsel for the people with a transcript of its contents.
You mean this tape was not given to you by your client?
translation.es: ¿Significa que su clienteno fue quien la entregó?

translation.en: No, Your Honor. We received it from a reluctant witness...
translation.es: No, la recibimosde un testigo renuente...

translation.en: ...Dr. Graham Cartwright, who will also be called to testify to its authenticity.
translation.es: ...el Dr. Graham Cartwright,quien declarará su autenticidad.

translation.en: The people will find his name on the updated witness list...
translation.es: Hallarán su nombreen la lista de testigos...

translation.en: ...we provided to them this morning.
Very well. I'll allow it into evidence.
Father Moore.
Will you play the tape for us now?
This is the exorcism of Emily Rose.
Those present are myself, Father Richard Moore...
translation.es: Los presentes somos yo,el padre Richard Moore...

translation.en: ...Nathaniel, Emily's father...
...Jason, her friend...
...a doctor who is here to monitor Emily during the ritual...
translation.es: ...un doctor que observará a Emilydurante el ritual...

translation.en: ...and Emily herself...
...who has given her permission for the ritual to be performed.
All right, now listen.
You may say the rosary or any private prayer for her deliverance...
translation.es: Recen el rosario o cualquier oraciónpara su salvación...

translation.en: ...when you're not responding to my words.
Above all...
...do whatever I ask, without question.
Don't ask it any questions...
...or pay any attention to what it says.
translation.es: ...ni presten atencióna lo que eso diga.

translation.en: "It"?
We won't be dealing with Emily tonight.
translation.es: Esta noche no hablaremos con Emily.

translation.en: Restrain her.
Lord Jesus Christ, have mercy on us.
It has begun.
Let us pray.
"Because she hopes in you, my God."
"Send her help from the holy place, Lord."
"And give her heavenly protection."
"May the Lord be with you."
"And with your spirit."
Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.es: Padre nuestro que estás en el cielo,santificado sea tu nombre.

translation.en: My God. Are you all right?
Dolls and kisses and crosses and wishes...
...you think that can save your little girl?
Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.
translation.es: Venga a nosotros su reino,así en la tierra como en el cielo.

translation.en: I'm fine.
Give us this day our daily bread.
translation.es: Danos el pan de cada día.

translation.en: And forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those that trespass against us.
translation.es: Y perdona nuestras ofensas, comoperdonamos a quien nos ofende.

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation--
translation.es: No nos dejes caer en la tentación...

translation.en: But deliver us from evil!
Who are you, demon? Tell me your name.
I am the one who dwells within....
In the Name of Christ...
...identify yourself!
One, two, three, four, five, six. One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres, cuatro, cinco, seis.

translation.en: Trick or treat. I give you treats and tricks.
translation.es: Truco o trato.Te doy regalos y trucos.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres, cuatro, cinco, seis.

translation.en: Father Moore!
Papa!
Emily!
Emily!
She feels so hot, Father! She's burning up!
Hold her down there on the straw! Hold her!
Emily!
Doctor! I need you here now. Watch her vital signs.
In the beginning was the word.
translation.es: En el principio fue la palabra.

translation.en: And the word was with God.
translation.es: Y la palabra era con Dios.

translation.en: And the word was the word, and what a wonderful word it was.
translation.es: Y la palabra era palabra,y qué maravilloso era Dios.

translation.en: Through him all things remain.
Without him, nothing was made that has been made.
translation.es: Sin ella no se hizo nadade cuanto existe.

translation.en: And the 70 disciples returned again with joy, saying:
translation.es: Los setenta discípulosregresaron con alegría, diciendo:

translation.en: "Lord, even the devils are subject unto us through thy name."
translation.es: "Señor, hasta los demoniosse someten ante tu nombre".

translation.en: Her heart is racing. It's almost 180 beats a minute.
translation.es: Su corazón se acelera.Casi 180 latidos por minuto.

translation.en: I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven.
translation.es: Vi a Satanás caer desde el cielocomo un rayo.

translation.en: Behold. I give you power to tread on serpents and scorpions...
translation.es: Les doy poder para pisotearserpientes y escorpiones...

translation.en: ...and over all the power of the enemy.
And nothing shall, by any means, hurt you.
Nothing...?
Get it off! Get it off! Get it off!
Release him, demon. I command you in the name of our Lord, Jesus Christ.
translation.es: ¡Suéltalo, demonio! ¡Te lo ordenoen nombre de Jesucristo!

translation.en: Tell me your name, wicked one.
One, two, three, four, five, six!
He who commands you is he who ordered you thrown down...
translation.es: Te lo ordena Él, quien te arrojó...

translation.en: ...from the highest heaven into the depths of hell.
translation.es: ...desde los cielosa la profundidad del infierno.

translation.en: In the name of our Lord, Jesus Christ, I now command you:
translation.es: En el nombre del Señor Jesucristo,te lo ordeno:

translation.en: Give me your name, demon!
Names!
Names!
One, two, three, four, five, six!
Ancient serpents...
...depart from this servant of God!
Tell me your six names!
We are the ones who dwell within!
I am the one who dwelt within Cain!
I am the one who dwelt within Nero!
I once dwelt within Judas!
And I was with Legion!
I am Belial!
And I am Lucifer...
...the devil in the flesh.
Mr. Rose.
Doctor, help him!
After a few moments, Mr. Rose revived...
translation.es: Después de unos momentos,el Sr. Rose se reanimó...

translation.en: ...but the exorcism had to be abandoned.
Emily was taken to her room and soon fell into a deep sleep.
translation.es: Llevaron a Emily a su cuartoy pronto se durmió profundamente.

translation.en: The whole thing was a complete failure.
Describe her behavior from the night of the failed exorcism...
translation.es: Describa la conducta de Emilydesde el exorcismo fallido...

translation.en: ...until the time of her death.
Violence towards others and herself.
Sometimes she screamed for hours on end.
She drove her head through windows, tried to bite....
Tried to bite holes in the walls, breaking several more of her teeth...
...as you saw in the postmortem photograph.
-You witnessed this? -Some of it, yes.
I tried to visit every day...
...and the family told me the rest.
Did you attempt another exorcism?
I wanted to, but Emily refused.
translation.es: Yo quise, pero Emily se negó.

translation.en: And without the consent of the possessed...
...the exorcism ritual can't be performed.
Did you encourage her to eat?
Yes, every time I saw her...
translation.es: Sí, cada vez que la veía...

translation.en: ...but the few times she tried, it seemed like....
Seemed like she couldn't swallow, or she couldn't keep it down.
What about medical care?
I wanted her to continue. I never said she should quit seeing her doctors.
translation.es: Nunca dije que abandonaraa los doctores.

translation.en: That would be wrong. Medical care is not my field.
translation.es: Hubiera sido un error.La medicina no es mi campo.

translation.en: But you did suggest she stop taking the drug Gambutrol.
Yes.
After the exorcism, she asked for my counsel.
translation.es: Después del exorcismo,ella me pidió consejo.

translation.en: She told me that the drugs had never helped her.
translation.es: Me dijo que el fármaconunca la había ayudado.

translation.en: After all, she was on Gambutrol during the exorcism...
...when her so-called symptoms were at their peak.
Ultimately, we both felt that she was beyond medical care...
translation.es: Ambos sentimos que ella estabamás allá del cuidado médico...

translation.en: ...and that she had to see this through to the end...
translation.es: ...y que debía atravesar estohasta el fin...

translation.en: ...by faith alone.
The dual voices we just heard on this tape...
translation.es: Las voces dualesque escuchamos en la cinta...

translation.en: ...you're certain that they were both coming from Emily at the same time?
translation.es: ...¿afirma que ambas surgíande Emily, al mismo tiempo?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I heard them.
Have you tampered with this tape in any way?
No. No, I have not.
No further questions at this time.
Mr. Thomas.
Father Moore, you consider this tape to be proof of the supernatural?
translation.es: Padre Moore, ¿esta grabaciónes prueba de lo sobrenatural?

translation.en: I think it's a record of certain indications...
...that Emily was possessed.
Signs of possession, you may call them.
By "signs of possession," would you mean her speaking in languages...
translation.es: Una "señal de posesión",¿sería hablar en lenguas...

translation.en: ...we might assume she couldn't possibly know?
And the vocalization of two distinct voices simultaneously?
Yes. Among other signs that I observed and described to the court...
translation.es: Sí, entre otras señalesque describí al tribunal.

translation.en: ...while the tape was playing. Things I saw.
Things you can't hear on the tape.
translation.es: ...pero no se oyen en la cinta.

translation.en: We'll just have to take your word, won't we?
-Your Honor. -Mr. Thomas.
I apologize. Father, as Emily's parish priest...
...are you aware that she underwent advanced catechism training?
translation.es: ...usted sabe que ella hizocursos de catecismo.

translation.en: Yes. Yes. Her family is very devout.
translation.es: Sí, su familia es muy devota.

translation.en: And in that training, did she study Ancient Greek, Hebrew and Latin?
translation.es: Y en estos cursos,¿estudió griego, hebreo o latín?

translation.en: Yes, I think that's right.
Might have even studied Aramaic, Christ and his disciples' language...
translation.es: Incluso pudo estudiar arameo,la lengua de Cristo...

translation.en: ...which, according to the transcripts, we also heard on the tape, correct?
translation.es: ...que según la trascripción,también escuchamos en la cinta.

translation.en: She spoke Aramaic on the tape. It wasn't part of her training.
translation.es: Habló arameo en la cinta.No fue parte de su curso.

translation.en: But it was offered as an elective at her catechism school.
I have the school's curriculum here if you'd like to see it.
translation.es: Tengo el currículum de la escuela,si desea verlo.

translation.en: No. I'll accept that she might have been exposed to that language.
translation.es: No. Acepto que pudo estar expuestaa esa lengua.

translation.en: And according to her high school records...
...German was the foreign language she studied there, yes?
I don't know. If you say so.
translation.es: No lo sé. Si usted lo dice.

translation.en: So that covers the strange languages we heard on the tape, correct?
translation.es: Eso cubre las extrañas lenguasque escuchamos en la cinta.

translation.en: Did I miss any?
-No. -Good.
We've already established you're no medical expert.
translation.es: Ya establecimosque no es experto médico.

translation.en: You said it's not your field.
translation.es: Dijo que no es su campo.

translation.en: But are you aware of the dual sets of vocal cords every human possesses?
translation.es: ¿Sabía que los humanos poseemosdoble grupo de cuerdas vocales?

translation.en: -No. -Have you heard of...
...the superior vocal cords, which are higher than the ones we use to speak?
translation.es: ...de las cuerdas superiores,más altas de las usadas para hablar?

translation.en: No. So you didn't know that Tibetan monks, for example...
...as part of their religious training, teach themselves...
...to activate both sets of vocal cords at once?
translation.es: ...a activar a la vezambos grupos de cuerdas vocales?

translation.en: No, I didn't know that.
Well, now that you do know, would you think it's possible...
translation.es: Ahora que lo sabe,¿cree posible que Emily...

translation.en: ...that Emily, in her psychotic state...
...might have activated both sets of vocal cords...
...so as to achieve the amazing effect we heard captured on your audiotape?
translation.es: ...para lograr el efectoque capturó en su grabación?

translation.en: Her state was not psychotic.
Father Moore, you told us that in the exorcism we heard...
translation.es: Padre Moore, nos dijoque en el exorcismo escuchado...

translation.en: ...you actually saw, once again, this black-robed figure...
translation.es: ...usted vio, otra vez,la figura vestida de negro...

translation.en: -...or demonic apparition, am I right? -Yes.
But we couldn't see him when you played the tape, correct?
translation.es: Pero no pudimos verlaal escuchar la cinta.

translation.en: -No, of course not. -Of course not.
So that would be another supernatural aspect of the exorcism...
-...your tape doesn't prove, correct? -Yes.
Where is your dark figure, Father?
Is he here now? Do I look like your demon ghost?
translation.es: ¿Está aquí ahora?¿Yo me parezco a su demonio?

translation.en: -Your Honor. -Counselor.
I have nothing further.
Does the defense wish to redirect?
No, Your Honor, but we reserve the right to recall the witness later.
translation.es: Nos reservamos el derechode llamar otra vez al testigo.

translation.en: Very well. The witness may step down.
Your Honor, my next witness must have been detained.
translation.es: Su Señoría, mi próximo testigodebió retrasarse.

translation.en: If we could take a short recess so I could--
You've made this court wait before, counselor. I'm inclined to--
translation.es: Ya nos hizo esperar.Me inclino por...
